options.content:
# README

Here you can see the "general" available capacity right now.
That means only capacity that is not reserved for external customer or certain projects, no decommissioned and only enabled hosts.   

For more details see the prefiltered sections below.

targets.expr:
sum(
  max by (compute_host, resource) (
    cortex_vmware_host_capacity_available{
      resource="cpu",
      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      workload_type="general-purpose",
      enabled=~"$enabled",
      decommissioned="false",
      external_customer="false",
      pinned_projects="false"
    }
  )
)

sum(
  max by (compute_host, resource) (
    cortex_vmware_host_capacity_total{
      resource="cpu",
      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      workload_type="general-purpose",
      enabled=~"$enabled",
      decommissioned="false",
      external_customer="false",
      pinned_projects="false"
    }
  )
)

panels.title: Total General Purpose Capacity (with commitments, no cpu architecture distinction)

targets.expr:
count(
  max by (compute_host) (
    cortex_vmware_host_capacity_total{
      # Use any resource here, otherwise the amount would have to be divided by 3, since the metric is exported 3 times per hypervisor (cpu, ram, disk)
      resource="cpu",
      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family",
      workload_type="general-purpose",
      pinned_projects=~"(^$|.*$project_id.*)",
      enabled="true"
    }
  )
) or on() vector(0)

count(
  max by (compute_host) (
    cortex_vmware_host_capacity_total{
      # Use any resource here, otherwise the amount would have to be divided by 3, since the metric is exported 3 times per hypervisor (cpu, ram, disk)

      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family",
      workload_type="general-purpose",
      pinned_projects=~"(^$|.*$project_id.*)",
      enabled="false"
    }
  )
) or on() vector(0)
